snippet: Under the terms of a deal brokered by his defense team and the prosecution, Jared L. Loughner will spend the rest of his life in prison, and be spared a possible death sentence.
lead_paragraph: Under the terms of a deal brokered by his defense team and the prosecution, Jared L. Loughner will spend the rest of his life in prison, and be spared a possible death sentence.

headline.main: Plea Agreement for Jared L. Loughner
